description: Created to perform across various landscapes and all types of adventures, the versatile Rethel works as a midlayer or standalone. Made from 73% recycled polyester, its Polartec® Power Air™ fabric is soft, thermally efficient, pill resistant, and engineered to minimize shedding. A DWR (Durable Water Repellent) treatment repels moisture. The fit layers easily, and articulated patterning elevates freedom of movement on the trail.
name: Arcteryx Rethel Jacket - Mens
